DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start time of the healthcare encounter (e.g., time of admission) represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to a subject's healthcare encounter._The time at which something is to start or did start.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 2021-6-9 ak. 12/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT added max length.  Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.22.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: HOSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable HOSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start time (as complete as possible ) of the healthcare encounter in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).
